snippet.title: C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars Release Trailer
snippet.description:
We're live! From creators of Cut the Rope and King of Thieves comes the most ingenious and stylish war machines constructor!

Get the game now for free on iOS and Android: http://zep.tl/catsyt

Build a battle car from collected parts and unleash its power against other players in automatic PvP fights!
 
Fight your way up from backyards to the World Championship. Win new parts and use them to design an unbeatable fighting robot. Make every opponent bite the dust!

Visit our website: https://www.catsthegame.com

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/catsthegame
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/catsthegame
Check out our Instagram: @cats_the_game
Visit our VK page: https://vk.com/catsthegame
